name: part_001
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2024】Dream Festival‼ ～Nakiriayame 7th BirthDay～【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [d4l17lJKhDE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'Tsunagaru Connect' on a vibrant, colorful stage with mascot characters.
Transition sequence with starry graphics and the 'Dream Festival!!' birthday logo, introducing the next segment.
Nakiri Ayame, Inugami Korone, Shirogane Noel, Nekomata Okayu, and Takane Lui perform 'Odore Orchestra' in marching band-inspired outfits.

subtitles.original: 君に私にできること
subtitles.english: What you and I can do

subtitles.original: 見つけていくから
subtitles.english: I'll keep finding them

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: うーん
subtitles.english: Uun

subtitles.original: 違う形　違う形なのに　ホントだ　同じ気持ち
subtitles.english: Different shapes, even though we're in different shapes, it's true, we feel the same way

subtitles.original: 繋がってる　今
subtitles.english: Connected now

subtitles.original: 分け合う温もり　ありがとう
subtitles.english: Sharing the warmth, thank you

subtitles.original: 思いっきり伝えたいんだ！
subtitles.english: I want to tell you with all my heart!

subtitles.original: カラフル！笑顔　心地いいね
subtitles.english: Colorful! Smiling faces, it feels so good

subtitles.original: 繋がってく　みんなと
subtitles.english: Connecting with everyone

subtitles.original: ここが私の好きな場所
subtitles.english: This is my favorite place

subtitles.original: 弾むココロ！　飛び出すセッション
subtitles.english: A bouncing heart! A session that jumps out

subtitles.original: To Connect しよ！
subtitles.english: Let's connect!

subtitles.original: I mean... No more hiding now
subtitles.english: I mean... No more hiding now

subtitles.original: Changing... So I'm trying now
subtitles.english: Changing... So I'm trying now

subtitles.english:

subtitles.original:
踊れオーケストラ
作詞・作曲：YASUHIRO(康寛)
subtitles.english:
Odore Orchestra
Lyrics/Composition: YASUHIRO

subtitles.original: さあさあこの指に止まれ
subtitles.english: Come, come, land on this finger

subtitles.original: 後悔あとで知っても知らないぞ
subtitles.english: I won't care even if you regret it later

subtitles.original: 音に呑まれて
subtitles.english: Swallowed by the sound

subtitles.original: 歌って踊って満たすだけ
subtitles.english: Just sing and dance to fill yourself up

subtitles.original: パパパン　手を打ち鳴らして
subtitles.english: Clap-clap-clap, clap your hands

subtitles.original: そうそう　足取りも軽快に
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, with a light step

subtitles.original: 音色を足して
subtitles.english: Add more tones

subtitles.original: 今導き出すよ
subtitles.english: I'll guide you now

subtitles.original: 正体は実は案外
subtitles.english: The true identity is actually quite

subtitles.original: 歯がゆいもの
subtitles.english: frustrating

subtitles.original: 魔法のタクト、空にかざすだけ
subtitles.english: Just hold the magic baton up to the sky

subtitles.original: おいでよ　街を包み込んだ超常現象が
subtitles.english: Come on, a supernatural phenomenon that has wrapped up the town

subtitles.original: 夜空にほら響き渡って　退屈が泣きだす
subtitles.english: Look, it echoes through the night sky, and boredom starts to cry

subtitles.original: 孤独な愛を産めよ　最終楽章アンサンブルを
subtitles.english: Give birth to lonely love, an ensemble of the final movement

subtitles.original: 君は聞こえた？
subtitles.english: Did you hear it?

subtitles.original: 星に舞う旋律を
subtitles.english: The melody dancing in the stars

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・スリー・シで鳴いてた
subtitles.english: One, two, three, four, I was crying

subtitles.original: 過去に負けない巡る力を
subtitles.english: A rotating power that won't lose to the past

subtitles.original: タンタン　楽しいリズムで
subtitles.english: Clap clap, with a fun rhythm

subtitles.original: 途切れない音を乗せて
subtitles.english: Carrying an unending sound

subtitles.original: 愛を奏でよう　この空に
subtitles.english: Let's play love in this sky

subtitles.original: 忘れてた景色の向こうの　その向こう
subtitles.english: Beyond the landscape I'd forgotten, and beyond that

subtitles.original: 未定調和のほころび
subtitles.english: A rift in the undetermined harmony

subtitles.original: モノクロの望遠鏡
subtitles.english: A monochrome telescope

subtitles.original: 待ったはなしのぶっつけ本番で
subtitles.english: No waiting, just jump right into the performance

subtitles.original: 奏でよう　理想輝く幻想的進行で
subtitles.english: Let's play with a fantastical progression where ideals shine

subtitles.original: いつも目が合うあいつと　手を繋ぎ踊ろう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands and dance with that person our eyes always meet with

subtitles.original: 何度も　泣いて泣いた心の悲歌（エレジー）を
subtitles.english: The elegy of the heart that has cried and cried many times

subtitles.original: 僕は聞こえた、
subtitles.english: I heard it,

subtitles.original: だから今ここにいるんだ
subtitles.english: That's why I'm here now

subtitles.english: The true identity is actually quite

subtitles.english: Let the magic tones echo through the sky

subtitles.english: Come on, a supernatural phenomenon that has wrapped up the town

subtitles.original: 夜空にほら響き渡って　退屈が泣きだす
subtitles.english: Look, it echoes through the night sky, and boredom starts to cry

subtitles.original: 愉快な歌を歌おう　最終演奏アンサンブルを
subtitles.english: Let's sing a cheerful song, an ensemble of the final performance
